column4: I am having some trouble getting evolution emailer to update my gmail account.  Everytime I load it up it starts to do it and then quickly cuts out of the connecting to smtp box.
not sure what it is but havent gotten any new incoming mail since oct
check your account... make sure all the settings are right. gmail has an faq about the proper settings, you can use google to find it. something like gmail mail server settings
no, google likely did not, but sometimes little things get changed in the account, just recheck it.
